casebody.data:
MICHIGAN GUN OWNERS, INC. and Ulysses Wong, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
ANN ARBOR PUBLIC SCHOOLS and Jeanice K. Swift, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 155196
COA: 329632 Supreme Court of Michigan. June 1, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of Engage 18 to file a brief amicus curiae and to extend the time for filing the brief is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on March 30, 2018, is accepted for filing.
